examples.title: 物体替换
examples.description: 精确替换图像中的特定物体，保持其他元素不变
examples.prompt: Replace the blue car with a red bicycle, keep everything else the same

examples.title: 风格转换
examples.description: 改变图像的艺术风格，同时保持主体和构图
examples.prompt: Transform this portrait into a vintage oil painting style from the 1800s

examples.title: 角色编辑
examples.description: 修改人物的服装、发型或表情
examples.prompt: Change the person's outfit to a formal business suit and add glasses

examples.title: 背景替换
examples.description: 完全更换图像背景，保持主体不变
examples.prompt: Replace the indoor background with a beautiful sunset beach scene
